function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Introduction of non-organic waste to indigenous communities","Impact":"Increased risk of contamination and spread of contagious diseases in the community","Mitigation":"Implementing proper waste management practices to reduce and contain non-organic waste","Technologies":"Waste separation and recycling systems","People":"Local indigenous communities","Owner":"Local authorities and community leaders"},{"Description":"Ecotourism bringing people from different parts of the world to indigenous communities","Impact":"Potential transmission of contagious diseases from visitors to the indigenous community members","Mitigation":"Implementing health screening measures for visitors and promoting hygiene practices","Technologies":"Health screening devices, sanitation facilities","People":"Visitors to the indigenous communities, community leaders","Owner":"Local health authorities and ecotourism operators"},{"Description":"Lack of waste management in the community","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission due to unsanitary conditions","Mitigation":"Education and training on waste management practices, development of waste disposal infrastructure","Technologies":"Waste disposal facilities, educational materials on waste management","People":"Local indigenous communities, community leaders","Owner":"Local authorities and environmental organizations"}]}
